      • fortificate

        protected void fortificate(Country from,
                           Country to,
                           int num)
                    throws Models.CountryNotInRealms,
                           Models.OutOfArmyException,
                           Models.NoSuchPathException,
                           Models.SourceIsTargetException,
                           Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException
        Transfers army from one country to another during the fortification phase
        Parameters:
        from - - from which country army is being taken
        to - - to which country army is being send
        num - - number of the army to transfer
        Throws:
        CountryNotInRealms - country not owned by the player
        OutOfArmyException - not enough army to transfer
        NoSuchPathException - no path from owned countries between country
        SourceIsTargetException - source country and target country is the same
        MoveAtLeastOneArmyException - 0 army chosen to move
